entry.title: Blasts Hit Russian Air Bases, Moscow Launches Missile Barrage on Ukraine
entry.content: Ukrainian drones hit two Russian air bases on Monday, Russia’s defense ministry said, and Russian missiles killed two people and injured at least two others in the Zaporizhzhia region.

entry.title: U.S. Altered Himars Rocket Launchers to Keep Ukraine From Firing Missiles Into Russia
entry.content: The U.S. secretly modified the advanced Himars rocket launchers it gave Ukraine so they can’t be used to fire long-range missiles into Russia, U.S. officials said, a precaution the Biden administration says is necessary to reduce the risk of a wider war with Moscow.

entry.title: Germany's New Favorite Sport: Competing to Save Energy
entry.content: After Russia throttled gas to the nation, washcloth wipe-downs and unheated pools; turning down the Christmas lights
